resources.string: CREATE TABLE login (authToken TEXT, email TEXT, password TEXT)

CREATE TABLE prospectos (id INT, name TEXT, surname TEXT, telephone TEXT, schProspectIdentification INT, address TEXT, createdAt TEXT, updatedAt TEXT, statusCd INT, zoneCode TEXT, neighborhoodCode TEXT, cityCode TEXT, sectionCode TEXT, roleId INT, appointableId INT, rejectedObservation TEXT, observation TEXT, disable INTEGER, visited INTEGER, callcenter INTEGER, acceptSearch INTEGER, campaignCode INT, userId INTEGER )
